title: Analysis of Gamification's Impact on Sustained MOOCs Usage and Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic MOOCs usage and foundational mathematical problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: A project-based course analyzing learner engagement and sustained usage intentions through a gamified math MOOC platform.

learning_goals: Analyze the impact of gamification elements on MOOCs user experience through structural modeling
The impact of interface design aesthetics on learning immersion (flow experience) can be evaluated.
Learner behavior data based on the Expectation-Confirmation Model (ECM) can be collected and applied to PBL activities.

resources: Learning Analytics Tools (Google Analytics, LMS Data)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
